page.title: 03Swale View Caravan Site (2)
page.content: People come from Germany, Holland, Australia, America as well as Great Britain, to enjoy the Dales and have a relaxing time. The River Swale is nearby for fishing or canoeing and there are plenty of footpaths for walkers. The site is open from March to October, Bank Holidays are very busy times when there can be between 350 and 400 people using the site. The owner of the site Mr. and Mrs Carter are kept busy booking people in, cutting the grass, cleaning the toilets, running the shop and sending brochures to people.
